# Spanish housing observatory 🏡🔍

A comprehensive macroeconomic view of the Spanish housing market. Each indicator contains notes and sources.
Questions?, contact me through twitter→ [@Galetaire](https://twitter.com/Galetaire).

## Available indicators

| 1. | Housing cycles | ➞ [Access](posts/rainbow) |
| -- | ------------------------------- | --- |
| 2. | Housing model | ➞ [Access](posts/six) |
| 3. | Price (annual) | ➞ [Access](posts/price) |
| 4. | Price (quarterly) | ➞ [Access](posts/pricequarter) |
| 5. | Home sales (annual) | ➞ [Access](posts/demography) |
| 6. | Home sales (quarterly) | ➞ [Access](posts/volume) |
| 7. | Mortgages and credit | ➞ [Access](posts/credit) |
| 8. | Land and building permits | ➞ [Access](posts/permits) |
| 9. | Unemployment | ➞ [Access](posts/labor) |
| 10. | Wages | ➞ [Access](posts/wages) |
| 11. | Type of buyer | ➞ [Access](posts/buyers) |
| 12. | Type of tenure | ➞ [Access](posts/tenure) |
| 13. | Cement consumption | ➞ [Access](posts/cement) |
| 14. | Dwellings stock | ➞ [Access](posts/stock) |
| 15. | Rental return | ➞ [Access](posts/rent) |
| 16. | Appreciation return | ➞ [Access](posts/appreciation) |
